sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { MapPin, DollarSign, Home, Zap, Calculator, Sun, TrendingUp, Users, Building2, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'; const SolarCalculator = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ zipCode: '', unitRate: '', monthlyBill: '', roofSize: 'medium', propertyType: 'residential', electricityProvider: '', roofShade: 'no-shade' }); const [results, setResults] = useState(null); const [showResults, setShowResults] = useState(false); const roofSizes = { 'small': { label: 'Small (< 1,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 0.7 }, 'medium': { label: 'Medium (1,000 - 2,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 1.0 }, 'large': { label: 'Large (> 2,000 sq ft)', multiplier: 1.4 } }; const shadeOptions = { 'no-shade': { label: 'Little to no shade', efficiency: 1.0 }, 'some-shade': { label: 'Some shade during the day', efficiency: 0.85 }, 'heavy-shade': { label: 'Heavy shade most of the day', efficiency: 0.65 } }; const calculateSolar = () => { const monthlyBillNum = parseFloat(formData.monthlyBill); if (!monthlyBillNum) return; // Basic calculations based on typical Indian solar metrics const annualUsage = monthlyBillNum * 12 / 6; // Assuming ₹6/kWh average rate in India const roofMultiplier = roofSizes[formData.roofSize].multiplier; const shadeEfficiency = shadeOptions[formData.roofShade].efficiency; const systemSize = (annualUsage / 1500) * roofMultiplier * shadeEfficiency; // kW (India gets more sun hours) const systemCost = systemSize * 65000; // ₹65,000/kW installed (typical Indian cost) const governmentSubsidy = Math.min(systemSize * 18000, 78000); // Central govt subsidy up to ₹78,000 const netCost = systemCost - governmentSubsidy; const annualSavings = monthlyBillNum * 12 * 0.90; // Assuming 90% offset const monthlySavings = annualSavings / 12; const paybackPeriod = netCost / annualSavings; // 25-year calculations let totalSavings = 0; for (let year = 1; year <= 25; year++) { const yearlyRate = 6 * Math.pow(1.05, year - 1); // 5% annual increase in India totalSavings += annualUsage * yearlyRate * 0.90; } const netSavings = totalSavings - netCost; setResults({ systemSize: systemSize.toFixed(1), numberOfPanels: Math.ceil(systemSize * 1000 / 400), systemCost: Math.round(systemCost), governmentSubsidy: Math.round(governmentSubsidy), netCost: Math.round(netCost), monthlySavings: Math.round(monthlySavings), annualSavings: Math.round(annualSavings), paybackPeriod: paybackPeriod.toFixed(1), totalSavings: Math.round(totalSavings), netSavings: Math.round(netSavings), co2Offset: Math.round(annualUsage * 0.82 * 25) // kg CO2 (India's emission factor) }); setShowResults(true); }; const nextStep = () => { if (step < 3) setStep(step + 1); else calculateSolar(); }; const prevStep = () => { if (step > 1) setStep(step - 1); }; if (showResults) { return (
{/* Header */}

It's My Sun

{/* Results Header */}

Your Solar Estimate

Based on your energy usage in {formData.zipCode}

{/* Key Metrics */}

Monthly Savings

₹{results.monthlySavings.toLocaleString()}

Average per month

System Cost

₹{results.netCost.toLocaleString()}

After government subsidy

Payback Period

{results.paybackPeriod} years

Break-even point

{/* Detailed Results */}

Solar System Details

System Specifications

System Size: {results.systemSize} kW
Number of Panels: {results.numberOfPanels} panels
Roof Size: {roofSizes[formData.roofSize].label.split('(')[0]}
Shading: {shadeOptions[formData.roofShade].label}

Financial Breakdown

System Cost: ₹{results.systemCost.toLocaleString()}
Government Subsidy: -₹{results.governmentSubsidy.toLocaleString()}
Net Cost: ₹{results.netCost.toLocaleString()}
Annual Savings: ₹{results.annualSavings.toLocaleString()}
{/* Long-term Savings */}

25-Year Financial Impact

Total Savings

₹{results.totalSavings.toLocaleString()}

Net Profit

₹{results.netSavings.toLocaleString()}

Environmental Impact: {results.co2Offset.toLocaleString()} kg of CO₂ offset over 25 years

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Go Solar?

Get connected with pre-screened solar installers in your area for free quotes

{/* Disclaimer */}

Disclaimer: These estimates are based on typical installations in India and may vary based on your specific situation, state government incentives, electricity tariffs, and actual energy usage. Final costs and savings will depend on your system design, local regulations, and installation specifics. Government subsidies may vary by state and system capacity. This calculator is for informational purposes only.

); } return (
{/* Header */}

It's My Sun

Solar Calculator

Step {step} of 3

{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress {Math.round((step/3)*100)}% Complete
{/* Step Content */}
{step === 1 && (

Where are you located?

We'll use your location to calculate local solar potential and incentives

setFormData({...formData, zipCode: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-3 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors" placeholder="Enter your ZIP code" maxLength="5" />
)} {step === 2 && (

What's your monthly electric bill?

This helps us estimate your energy usage and potential savings

₹ setFormData({...formData, monthlyBill: e.target.value})} className="w-full pl-8 pr-4 py-3 text-lg border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-orange-500 focus:outline-none transition-colors" placeholder="3000" />
{['residential', 'commercial'].map((type) => ( ))}
)} {step === 3 && (

Tell us about your roof

This information helps us size your solar system accurately

{Object.entries(roofSizes).map(([key, size]) => ( ))}
{Object.entries(shadeOptions).map(([key, option]) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Navigation Buttons */}
{/* Trust Indicators */}

Trusted by thousands of homeowners

50,000+ estimates
Licensed installers
Free service
); }; export default SolarCalculator;
